lead_paragraph: Hungary is the home of 15 Olympic men's water polo medals, more than any other country. It owned the pool in Sydney, Athens and Beijing, winning three consecutive gold medals.

headline.print_headline: Not Just Serbia in Men's Water Polo Tournament
headline.main: Not Just Serbia in Men's Water Polo Tournament
